result.html: Tá an císte seo an-mhilisThis cake is very sweet.
result.ponchtml: Tá an císte seo an-ṁilisThis cake is very sweet.

result.eng: What time will we make the cake?
result.ga: Cén t-am a dhéanfas muid an cáca
result.orig: Cén t-am a dhéanfas muid an cáca
result.html: Cén t-am a dhéanfas muid an cácaWhat time will we make the cake?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a ḋéanfas muid an cácaWhat time will we make the cake?
